alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Loxahatchee NWR, or 11 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Wellington, Royal Palm Beach, Parkland, Loxahatchee NWR, Lion Country Safari Park and Loxahatchee Groves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
